title: Central Tribal University of Andhra Pradesh: Admission 2024, Courses, Fees, Merit List, Scholarships
meta_description: Central Tribal University of A.P - [CTUAP ], Vizianagaram, Andhra Pradesh Application Form, Admissions, Contact, Website, Map, MBA, B.Sc + M.Sc, MA . 19 Courses. Average Fees is 5940 per year.

basic_info.name: Central Tribal University of Andhra Pradesh Merit List 2024 (Released)
CTUAP Vizianagaram Admission
description: Admission to various courses at Central Tribal University of Andhra Pradesh is on the basis of merit and score in CTUAP CET entrance exam. The application process is done online.

basic_info.name: CTUAP Vizianagaram Scholarship
description: Students of CTUAP can apply for the Janmabhoomi Scholarship. The University assists the students to enroll via Janmabhoomi Scholarship Portal which is maintained by the State Government. The Government of Andhra Pradesh gives scholarships based on certain criteria namely the eligibility of students and income of parents.

basic_info.name: CTUAP Vizianagaram Facilities
description: The college offers various facilities to students on campus only. The students have access to the following facilities at CTUAP:

faqs.question: Ques:What is the seat intake at Central Tribal University of Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans:Central Tribal University of Andhra Pradesh offers 20 seats each in all courses each year including the EWS category.

faqs.question: Ques: What is the exam pattern of CTUAP CET?
faqs.answer: Ans:CTUAP CET is a 90 minute test containing 100 MCQs.All questions carry one mark each and the test does not have negative marking. In the case of all courses other than BBA, the test is divided into Section A and B, each with 50 questions. For BBA, the test is divided into 4 parts A,B,C and D all containing 25 questions each.

faqs.question: Ques: Is there reservation for seats at Central Tribal University of Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans:Yes, there is reservation of seats for the following categoriesDifferently abled candidatesSupernumerary seats (for students of Jammu Kashmir)NCC CadetsNSS VolunteersSportsWards/Dependants of Defence Personnel

faqs.question: Ques: Is there an age limit for applying to courses at Central Tribal University of Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans:Yes, there is an upper age limit for applying to UG and PG courses as given below, there is a relaxation of 5 year to SC/ST/PWD students.CourseAge Limit (As on 1st July of Academic Year)UG22 YearsPG27 Years

faqs.question: Ques: What are the documents necessary for admission at Central Tribal University of Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans:For admission to courses at Central Tribal University of Andhra Pradesh candidates need the following documents:Hall-Ticket of qualifying Examination.Marksheet of qualifying exam.SSC Records.Caste certificate for SC/ST/BC/EWS candidates.Documentations of PH/NCC/ NSS/SPORTS /CAP etc.Income certificate of parents.Study or Residence (from M.R.O) or equivalent for residential proof.

Section.name: About CTUAP
Section.description:
Central Tribal University of Andhra Pradesh, Vizianagaram was established in 2019 under the approval of University Grants commission. The college offers postgraduate degrees, integrated courses and PG diploma in disciplines such as Science, Social Work, Journalism, Tourism and Management. Admissions are on the basis of merit and entrance tests conducted by the university. CTUAP currently functions as a transit campus.
4.1 How to Apply?
The particulars of courses offered by CTUAP are tabulated below:
Read more: CTUAP Courses & Fees
Admission to various courses at Central Tribal University of Andhra Pradesh is on the basis of merit and score in CTUAP CET entrance exam. The application process is done online.
Students of CTUAP can apply for the Janmabhoomi Scholarship. The University assists the students to enroll via Janmabhoomi Scholarship Portal which is maintained by the State Government. The Government of Andhra Pradesh gives scholarships based on certain criteria namely the eligibility of students and income of parents.
The college offers various facilities to students on campus only. The students have access to the following facilities at CTUAP:
Ques:What is the seat intake at Central Tribal University of Andhra Pradesh?
Ans:Central Tribal University of Andhra Pradesh offers 20 seats each in all courses each year including the EWS category.
Ques: What is the exam pattern of CTUAP CET?
Ans:CTUAP CET is a 90 minute test containing 100 MCQs.All questions carry one mark each and the test does not have negative marking. In the case of all courses other than BBA, the test is divided into Section A and B, each with 50 questions. For BBA, the test is divided into 4 parts A,B,C and D all containing 25 questions each.

Ans:Yes, there is an upper age limit for applying to UG and PG courses as given below, there is a relaxation of 5 year to SC/ST/PWD students.
